DOC.brief_summary: Childhood obesity public health problem ; Mexican child high prevalence cardiovascular risk factor present . Physical activity propose strategy reduce risk . We conduct pre-posttest intervention study 214 school-aged Mexican child ( 4th 6th grade ) , assess effect two physical activity routine different duration intensity ( 40 minute aerobic routine vs. 20 minute routine ) cardiovascular risk marker . Physical activity routine assign randomly two public school Toluca , Mexico ( 20 min : group 1 ( n= 117 ) , 40 min : group 2 ( n=97 ) ) . The routine implement Monday Friday 12 week . Nutrition assessment do intervention include anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , body mass index , waist circumference body composition ) , blood pressure biochemical analysis ( triglyceride , total cholesterol LDL-cholesterol , HDL-Cholesterol , glucose insulin ) . Heart rate monitor 3 time intervention evaluate routine´s intensity .
